### Lua {VERSION} Binaries for Windows

Built binaries for **Lua {VERSION}**.
Based on the official source code.

#### Build Details

* **Compiler**: MinGW-w64
* **Linking**: Static (No external DLLs required)
* **Architectures**:
  * `win64` (x86_64) - Recommended for modern PCs
  * `win32` (i686) - Legacy support

#### Documentation & Changelog

* [Official Lua {MAJOR_MINOR} Reference Manual](https://www.lua.org/manual/{MAJOR_MINOR}/)
* [Official Readme & License](https://www.lua.org/manual/{MAJOR_MINOR}/readme.html)

---
*Disclaimer: This is an unofficial binary distribution. For source code, verify at [www.lua.org](https://www.lua.org).*
